recommended_degree: Akuntansi, Keuangan, Ekonomi, Administrasi Bisnis, Manajemen (Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will assist the Supervisor in preparing manual journal accruals related to Marketing and Trade Promotion, both for Domestic and International markets. This includes supporting data gathering, documentation, and ensuring journal entries are prepared accurately and on schedule. This position is onsite at the Gunung Putri plant.
